data.name: Daldos
data.detailed_description:
What is Daldos?


Daldos is a game about the confrontation of two players, whose warriors came together in battle on board one drakkar. The game is about cold calculation. The game is about a single winner!

You will have to fight with other players in the classic game of the ancient Vikings to show who is the best here!
Show everyone your strategic and tactical skills, challenge any opponent to a duel and win a magnificent victory, taking pride of place in Valhalla!

What is this game about?


In Daldos, you will have a squad consisting of 16 warriors under your leadership. You meet with your opponent's squad on the deck of the drakkar. Your main task is to defeat the enemy forces by reducing the number of enemy troops to 1 warrior.

But it will not be easy to do this, because every player is a dangerous and experienced strategist. The same as you! Use your wits, show your strategic and tactical skills, make the right decision and take the right action - then your victory will not keep you waiting long!

What features does Daldos have?


Firstly, uniqueness. You will not find analogues of this game!
Secondly - network and local multiplayer. This will allow you to show your power to everyone else!
Thirdly, stylization. Beautiful graphics, carved interface and theme music - all this will please your inner connoisseur.
Fourth - four languages! The game is translated into Russian, English, Norwegian and Danish!

The game is about a single winner! You will have to fight with other players in the classic Viking game and show who is the best here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 720 GT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
